In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Vago Mundo" [[Zhongli]] ({{Geo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Blazing Riff" [[Xinyan]] ({{Pyro}}), "Wolf Boy" [[Razor]] ({{Electro}}), and "Frozen Ardor" [[Chongyun]] ({{Cryo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

After the conclusion of this event, the 4-star character "Blazing Riff" [[Xinyan]] ({{Pyro}}) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" from [[Version 1.2]] onwards.

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
